title: Просто Михалыч
overview: A relative from the Siberian hinterland, a simple and straightforward peasant Mikhalych, arrives at the country house of the wealthy Belyakovs family in the capital. He came to Moscow to solve problems and save the fishing industry in the taiga, which a large corporation wants to absorb. The Belyakovs are not happy about an unexpected visit from a relative, but this visit will change the life of every family member.
